item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2013/05/31/new-visit-menu/#comment-143">Richard Trott</a>.
It was mostly spurred by some user testing that actually focused on computing, but revealed that people were not finding what they expected under Locations. Usage data played a role too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Richard Trott.

It was mostly spurred by some user testing that actually focused on computing, but revealed that people were not finding what they expected under Locations. Usage data played a role too.

item.title: By: Richard Trott
item.dc:creator: Richard Trott
item.description: Hooray for interface improvements! Did these come about as things that everyone kinda sorta just knew were improvements that could be made, or did they come out of data somehow?
item.content:encoded: Hooray for interface improvements! Did these come about as things that everyone kinda sorta just knew were improvements that could be made, or did they come out of data somehow?

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: I forgot to mention that "About the Library" is now found in the footer of every page, as is typical of many other web sites.
item.content:encoded: I forgot to mention that “About the Library” is now found in the footer of every page, as is typical of many other web sites.
